column3: from the paper: cor-C marker was found to represent a fragment of a novel non-essential gene, cor1+
They are not the same construct, but they were used interchangeably, so they are synonyms in the genotype-phenotype sense
very similar to that of PMID:21131906, but not exactly the same
error in PomBase: "the fusion of the bulky MBP protein to the Ctp1 N terminus (N-MBP)". MBP stands for maltose-binding protein
